masterQuiz.title: MasterQuiz
masterQuiz.modal: MasterQuiz is a SPA developed with React and Vite. It uses React Router for navigation, Bootstrap for styling, and is designed to offer an interactive and educational trivia experience.
features: Variety of Questions: Wide selection of categories and levels.
Scoring System: Real-time performance tracking.
Fast Navigation: Uses React Router for a fluid experience.
Responsive Design: Adaptable interface with Bootstrap and React-Bootstrap.
Reusable Components: Organized and scalable development.
Modern Configuration: Vite for an agile development environment.
masterQuiz.description: A Q&A application to challenge your knowledge.

todoList.title: ToDoList
todoList.short: Organize your tasks with this modern Full-Stack app.
todoList.modal: ToDoList is a Full-Stack web application developed with Next.js, TypeScript, Prisma, and Tailwind CSS. It allows managing personal tasks through an intuitive interface and a robust backend that uses API Routes and SQLite as a database. It's a practice project to understand Next.js concepts.
features: Task CRUD: Create, read, edit, and delete tasks.
Next.js Frontend: Reactive, fast, and responsive UI.
Tailwind CSS: Modern and clean styling.
Prisma and SQLite Backend: Simple and efficient data persistence.
API Routes: Backend handling directly from Next.js.
Clear Organization: Separation of logic, routes, components, and database.
todoList.description: Full-Stack app with Next.js and Prisma for task management.

etechStore.title: E-TechStore
etechStore.short: Explore and shop for tech products at E-TechStore.
etechStore.modal: E-TechStore is a Full-Stack e-commerce application developed with React and Firebase. It allows users to browse a product catalog, manage a cart, and simulate a purchase. It's designed with a modern architecture, using Firestore as a cloud database.
features: Product Catalog: List with images, prices, and descriptions.
Product Details: Individual information for each item.
Shopping Cart: Easily add, remove, and modify products.
Category Navigation: Quick exploration by product type.
Simulated Checkout: Purchase process with a customer form.
Firebase Firestore: Real-time backend for products and orders.
etechStore.description: Online tech store with React and Firebase as a backend.

labCoderhouse.title: Coderhouse Lab Project
labCoderhouse.short: Comprehensive management system for clinical laboratories.
labCoderhouse.modal: Coderhouse Lab is a complete database system that manages appointments, patients, results, payments, and medical staff. Implemented in MySQL, it features stored procedures, functions, triggers, and views to optimize the operation of a clinical laboratory, with role-based access control and supported by scripts and Docker containers.
features: Appointment Management: Automates booking, assignment, and tracking.
Results Control: Insertion and updating of results with access control.
User and Role Management: Differentiated access based on user profile.
Payments and Billing: Recording and reporting of operations by payment type and date.
SQL Scripts: Modular structure with triggers, procedures, and functions.
Docker Integration: Easy deployment and testing with containers.
Reports and Views: Clear visualization of study and payment status.
labCoderhouse.description: Laboratory management system developed as the final project for the SQL course at Coderhouse.

labFrontend.title: Clinical Laboratory
labFrontend.short: Consult analyses and personal data from the browser.
labFrontend.modal: Clinical Laboratory is an application developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that allows for patient management and clinical results consultation. It uses Firebase as a backend for authentication and real-time data storage. It is a project aimed at providing a simple, functional, and accessible solution from the browser.
features: Patient Management: Registration, consultation, and information viewing.
Results Consultation: Secure viewing of clinical analyses.
Firebase Authentication: Patient registration and login.
Intuitive UI: Interface built with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Accessibility: No installation or external frameworks needed.
Clear Structure: Separation of logic, styles, and views in dedicated folders.
labFrontend.description: Frontend project with Firebase for patient management and clinical analyses.

tesloShop.title: Teslo-Shop
tesloShop.short: Modern virtual store with shopping cart and responsive design.
tesloShop.modal: Teslo-Shop is an online store developed with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It allows users to browse products, view their details, and add them to a shopping cart. Its clean, responsive, and modular structure is designed to be a solid base for modern e-commerce projects. It's a practice project to understand Next.js with TypeScript.
features: Product Catalog: Visual and descriptive browsing.
Detail Pages: Expanded information for each product.
Shopping Cart: Easily add, remove, and manage products.
Responsive Design: Adapted for desktop, tablet, and mobile.
Global State with Zustand: Efficient cart management.
Modular and Scalable: Clear separation between views, components, and logic.
tesloShop.description: E-commerce project with Next.js and Zustand for cart management.

cafeGeisha.title: Café de la Geisha
cafeGeisha.short: Elegant landing page for a fictional coffee shop.
cafeGeisha.modal: Café de la Geisha is a static landing page designed with HTML and CSS. It represents the visual identity of a fictional coffee shop, presenting its services, staff, and contact information on a single modern and responsive page. Ideal for deploying as a commercial presentation site.
features: Modern Design: Attractive interface with a visual focus.
Descriptive Sections: Home, services, staff, and contact.
Price List: Accessible and clear table.
Responsive: Compatible with mobile devices.
Smooth Navigation: Menu for fluid scrolling.
Completely Static: Easy to run in any browser.
cafeGeisha.description: Landing page for a fictional coffee shop developed with HTML5 and CSS3.

simuladorViajes.title: Travel Simulator
simuladorViajes.short: Simulate your trips, manage your wallet, and explore the world.
simuladorViajes.modal: Travel Simulator is a frontend application that allows users to manage a virtual budget, buy tickets, explore destinations, and track their trips. It is developed with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, using tools like Bootstrap, Toastify-js, Moment.js, and OpenWeatherMap to enrich the user experience.
features: Virtual Wallet: Add and manage your balance for travel.
Destination Catalog: Travel to cities available in a local JSON file.
Smart Filters: Show only trips accessible with your balance.
Travel History: Visualize where and when you went.
Current Status: Show the weather and time at your destination with OpenWeather and Moment.js.
Local Persistence: Automatic data saving in localStorage.
simuladorViajes.description: Interactive app to simulate trips with real data and browser persistence.
